Key Match Events: Sam Hilliard tied the game with a two-run homer in the ninth inning
Brenton Doyle delivered a game-winning single in the 10th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Coors Field in Denver, Colorado
The Cubs had 11 hits and 5 runs
The Rockies had 8 hits and 6 runs
Others: The game was the third and final meeting between the teams in the series
